## jx upgrade

Upgrades resources

### Usage

```
jx upgrade
```

### Synopsis

Upgrades all of the plugins in your local Jenkins X CLI

### Examples

  # upgrades your plugin binaries
  jx upgrade

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for upgrade
```
